contact: J.Burch, R.Ergun, P.Lindqvist. @ SWRI, LASP, KTH

parameters.name: mms1_edp_dce_gse_slow_l2
parameters.description: L2 DC E Field (GSE coords) calibrated for SDP and ADP, all flag values included

parameters.name: mms1_edp_dce_dsl_slow_l2
parameters.description: L2 DC E Field (DSL coords) calibrated for SDP and ADP, all flag values included

parameters.name: mms1_edp_dce_par_epar_slow_l2
parameters.description: L2 DC E Parallel Field with error calibrated for SDP and ADP

parameters.name: mms1_edp_dce_err_slow_l2
parameters.description: Approximate DC E field error derived from SDP (quality and bitmask) and ADP (residue)

parameters.name: mms1_edp_quality_slow_l2
parameters.description: Quality indicator (3 good), (2 ok data, use with some caution), (1 bad data, use with caution), (0 Really bad data or no data at all)
